title: Which cooking oil is the best?
description: Are some cooking oils better for your health than others?

vocabItems.word: a load ofadvocatewhat the heckwonder productknock yourself outhogwash
vocabItems.definition: a load of (something)a lot of (something) advocate (something)encourage people to use or do (something) what the heckinformal phrase used to express frustration or surprise wonder productan item, usually food or medicine, that people think is very effective or beneficial knock yourself outgo ahead hogwashnonsense or not true
